title: Special Someone
description: Just when she was giving up on finding love, a special someone stumbled into her life.
altHero: Conner Verreaux and Emily Lombardo about to kiss
alt1: Verreaux and Lombardo passing each other on the street
alt2: Verreaux kneeling with tears in his eyes
alt3: Verreaux and Lombardo getting married in a church
alt4: Verreaux and Lombardo freshly married, driving in a convertible
